contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 13, 1980 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £45 and trophy, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 5 bands competed. 22nd annual contest.
June 2, 2014, 4:06 p.m. March 30, 2017, 8:23 a.m.
1 Rhodian Brass David Windle
2 Pleasley Colliery Welfare Band Brian Draper
3 Carlton Main Juniors Brian Till
Unknown Result Chesterfield & District D. A. Lefley
Unknown Result Ireland Colliery Band Francis Evans
